_sText: Like "glassfloor_reloaded" before it, "glassfloor_revolutions" is roughly based on Kaddar's "glassfloor_kdr", which is based on a glassfloor map in the 1.6 era that was quite original. Here's my take on it so enjoy playing! (glassfloor_revolutions is a larger, improved version of glassfloor_reloaded, with 3 decks of glass instead of two.)
